definition: contrary/in reverse/inside out or upside down/to reverse/to return/to oppose/opposite/against/anti-/to rebel/to use analogy/instead/abbr. for 反切[fan3 qie4] phonetic system
Belgium/Belgian/abbr. for 比利時|比利时[Bi3 li4 shi2]
to compare/(followed by a noun and adjective) more {adj.} than {noun}/ratio/to gesture/(Taiwan pr. [bi4] in some compounds derived from Classical Chinese)

pinyin: ping2 fang1 fan3 bi4 ding4 lu:4

sentences.english: The ratio of commissions to be collected shall be set in accordance with the principle of making an inverse ratio to the auction completion price.
sentences.chinese: 收取佣金的比例按照同拍卖成交价成反比的原则确定。

sentences.english: The interval between the interferentialpeaks is also inversely proportional tO the epitaxy layer thickness.
sentences.chinese: 外延层的干涉小峰间距反比于外延层的厚度。

sentences.english: The relative contents of calcium hydroxide in the colloid are inversely proportional to the colloidal particle size.
sentences.chinese: 胶体中氢氧化钙相对含量与胶粒的大小成反比。

sentences.english: Probability of anything happening is inverse ratio to its desirability.
sentences.chinese: 一件事发生的可能怀与它受欢迎的程度成反比。

sentences.english: For dry switches, the contact resistance is inversely related to the contact area.
sentences.chinese: 对于干式开关，接触电阻与接触面积成反比关系。

sentences.english: The frequency with which teams will want to use an assessment is inversely proportional to the time it takes.
sentences.chinese: 团队想要进行评估的频率反比于评估所耗费的时间。

sentences.english: It was found that the transmissivity is inversely proportional to the incident pulse energy approximately.
sentences.chinese: 实验发现，激光的透射率与其入射能量近似成反比。

sentences.english: That's a mistake, because v itself is a function of r.
sentences.chinese: 成反比是错的，因为v也是r的函数。

sentences.english: Established the landform model by distance power inverse ratio method and fractal interpolation algorithm.
sentences.chinese: 利用距离幂反比法加分形插值算法建立了地形模型。

sentences.english: Hydrostatic pressure reacts on the efficiency of breaking rock.
sentences.chinese: 破岩效率与静水压力成反比。

sentences.english: Spherical divergence decreases energy with the square of the distance.
sentences.chinese: 球面扩散使波的能量与传播距离的平方成反比。

sentences.english: If other connections are available, the amperes will vary inversely with rated voltage.
sentences.chinese: 也可采用其它电压，但安培值将与电压值成反比关系。

sentences.english: If one of two quantities increases as the other decreases, we say that they are in inverse proportion .
sentences.chinese: 若二量之间一增加一减少，我们则称二者成反比例。

sentences.english: Fig4. Therefore, should be inverse ratio btw IQ and happiness.
sentences.chinese: 由此可见，智商和快乐成反比。

sentences.english: Bond prices and yields move in opposite directions.
sentences.chinese: 债券的价格和其收益率成反比。

sentences.english: The rate of reannealing is inversely proportion to sequence complexity.
sentences.chinese: 再退火速度是和顺序复杂性成反比例。

definition: to approach (a numerical value)/to converge to a limit (in calculus)/convergence
to hasten/to hurry/to walk fast/to approach/to tend towards/to converge
lit. mustn't speak of two things on the same day (idiom); not to be mentioned in the same breath/incomparable
pinyin: bu4 ke3 tong2 ri4 er2 yu3

definition: fall short by a large amount
